resources.string: “Putting the country first means Obama nominating a Justice and the Senate doing its constitutional duty by voting on the nominee.”
The Supreme Court is too important to allow a vacancy longer than a year. #SCOTUS
Moving terrorists from Gitmo to U.S. soil proves Obama is once again willing to set aside the rule of law
